mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${dbName}.day_behave_recordlist ( player_id, app_id, retain_way, todayRed, totalRed , today_encourageAdv_count, service_CallBack_AdvCount , service_CallBack_Reward_Count, retain_time) VALUES (#{dayRecord.playerId}, #{dayRecord.appId}, #{dayRecord.retainWay}, #{dayRecord.todayred}, #{dayRecord.totalred}, #{dayRecord.todayEncourageAdvCount}, #{dayRecord.serviceCallBackAdvCount}, #{dayRecord.serviceCallBackRewardCount}, #{dayRecord.retainTime})
mapper.select: SELECT day_id, player_id, app_id, retain_way, todayRed, totalRed, today_encourageAdv_count, service_CallBack_AdvCount, service_CallBack_Reward_Count, retain_time, day_cash FROM ${dbName}.day_behave_recordlist WHERE player_id = #{playerId} group by player_id, date(retain_time) order by date(retain_time) desc limit 1
